name: NetBeez
headline: Network monitoring from the end-user perspective
description: NetBeez is the Digital Experience Monitoring platform enabling IT teams to easily support remote users by quickly troubleshooting communication and network performance issues from the user’s perspective.

founders.name: Stefano Gridelli, Founder/CEO
founders.description: Stefano Gridelli is Co-founder and CEO of NetBeez. He has several years of experience as a network engineer, working on design projects for large and complex network environments. He holds a M.S. degree in Computer Science from the Università degli Studi di Milano, Italy, and an MBA from Carnegie Mellon University.

# Total Network Visibility
Monitor end-to-end network performance with high-frequency polling 
[Request a Demo](https://netbeez.net/<#request-form>) Discover our demo process 
![chart image](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/home-hero-table.svg)
![dashboard](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/home-hero-table-shadow.svg)
![10 years](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/10-years.svg)
## Minimize business downtime
Assure network performance and accelerate incident resolution
![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-logo-1.svg)
Capture every event with granular data
Use NetBeez for granular network performance metrics with one-second intervals, reducing troubleshooting time by up to 80%. Identify root causes quickly and keep users happy. 
![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-img-1-main.svg) ![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-img-1-1.svg) ![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-img-1-2.svg)
![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-logo-2.svg)
Locate, isolate, and address the root cause
Rather than experiencing the same problem over and over again, use NetBeez to accurately isolate the time and location of issues. Retain historical data to identify trends and perform root cause analysis on recurring issues. 
![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-img-2-main.webp) ![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-img-2-1.webp)
![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-logo-3.svg)
Detect problems before users do
Perform real-time, end-to-end network testing from the user perspective with continuous active monitoring. Detect service failures, network and application performance degradations quickly. 
![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-img-3-main.webp) ![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-img-3-1.svg)
## Troubleshoot complex networks
See the issues from the end-user's perspective
[NetBeez tech specs & features](https://netbeez.net/<https:/resources.netbeez.net/hubfs/Resources-PDF/NetBeez%20Specs%20and%20Features.pdf>)
![decoration image](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/card-network-1.webp)
Multiple server deployment options
  * On-prem as a virtual appliance
  * On public clouds such as AWS, Azure, or Google
  * Hosted by NetBeez


![decoration image](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/card-network-2.webp)
Agents support extensive tests and measurements
  * Network latency, round-trip time, packet loss
  * VPN and SaaS monitoring
  * DNS tests and performance
  * Download and upload internet speed
  * VoIP performance with jitter and MOS


![decoration image](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/card-network-3.webp)
Flexible support & integration options
  * Plug-and-play hardware or software network agents
  * Lightweight clients for Windows and Mac OS endpoints
  * Monitor home and enterprise WiFi networks
  * Notifications via SMTP, SNMP, Syslog, and webhooks
  * Integrations with ServiceNow, Splunk, MS Teams, Slack, and more


## NetBeez is trusted all over the globe
80%
of our customers find us online
![decoration image](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/testimonials-statistics.webp)
![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/twitter_thumb_201604_ccie_lifetime_emeritus_xlarge_600x600-1.png)
South Africa
The data from the NetBeez sensors shed light on metrics that we weren’t able to capture before with traditional network monitoring tools based on SNMP and NetFlow. Thanks to the active and end-to-end performance tests run by NetBeez, our support team can now save time and resources in addressing remote network performance issues. 
Dave Kruger
Technical Director at Myria Solutions, CCIE #25701 Emeritus
![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Frame-93899-1.png)
USA
With NetBeez we gained the ability to determine the root cause and solve intermittent Wi-Fi problems in under an hour. Without NetBeez it would have taken a very long time to even discover the issue after receiving a student complaint. 
Christopher Pepper
Network Engineer at University of Rhodes Island
![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/sphere_1-1.png)
USA
Network performance monitoring vendor NetBeez has introduced a new Work-From-Home Agent that extends granular, real-time visibility into end-user experience in any home office, thus closing the visibility gap created by the surge in remote workers. 
Shamus McGillicuddy
VP of Research Network Infrastructure and Operations, EMA Research
![intuit logo](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/partner-1.webp)
![intuit logo](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/partner-2.webp)
![intuit logo](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/partner-3.webp)
![intuit logo](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/partner-4.webp)
![intuit logo](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/partner-5.webp)
![intuit logo](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/partner-6.webp)
## Keep your network running smoothly
Resolve incidents with NetBeez intelligence
[ Network Performance Monitoring ![solution logo](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/solution-2.svg) Run continuous, end-to-end tests to ensure the network infrastructure performs well, proactively identifying and resolving issues  Learn More ](https://netbeez.net/<https:/netbeez.net/network-monitoring/>) [ Wi-Fi Monitoring and Assurance ![solution logo](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/solution-4.svg) Monitor Wi-Fi from the client perspective to deliver reliable and secure wireless connectivity to mobile users  Learn More ](https://netbeez.net/<https:/netbeez.net/wifi-monitoring/>) [ Digital Experience Monitoring ![solution logo](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/solution-1.svg) Analyze the performance of digital systems and services by tracking the digital experience from the end-user perspective  Learn More ](https://netbeez.net/<https:/netbeez.net/digital-experience-monitoring/>) [ Remote Worker Network Monitoring ![solution logo](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/solution-3.svg) Extend network performance monitoring to the home office with Windows and Mac endpoints  Learn More ](https://netbeez.net/<https:/netbeez.net/remote-worker-monitoring/>) [ Hybrid-Cloud Network Monitoring ![solution logo](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/solution-5.svg) Ensure connectivity, performance, and reliability of your private and public cloud  Learn More ](https://netbeez.net/<https:/netbeez.net/hybrid-cloud-network-monitoring/>) [ SaaS and Application Performance ![solution logo](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/solution-6.svg) Verify the end-user experience and performance of SaaS and hosted applications  Learn More ](https://netbeez.net/<https:/netbeez.net/saas-and-application-performance/>)
## Reliability builds trust
Don't let network issues ruin it
[ ![decoration logo](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/reliability-4.webp) Remote Contact Centers ](https://netbeez.net/<https:/netbeez.net/remote-contact-centers/>) [ ![decoration logo](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/reliability-6.webp) Telecommunications ](https://netbeez.net/<https:/netbeez.net/telecommunications/>) [ ![decoration logo](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/reliability-1.webp) Healthcare ](https://netbeez.net/<https:/netbeez.net/healthcare/>) [ ![decoration logo](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/reliability-2.webp) Technology ](https://netbeez.net/<https:/netbeez.net/technology/>) [ ![decoration logo](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/reliability-3.webp) Financial Services ](https://netbeez.net/<https:/netbeez.net/financial-services/>) [ ![decoration logo](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/reliability-5.webp) Higher Education ](https://netbeez.net/<https:/netbeez.net/higher-education/>)
## Don’t see your industry here?
Talk to our solution engineers to discuss how NetBeez can help your business case. 
[Get a free consultation](https://netbeez.net/<#request-form>)
## Get started with NetBeez
Request a demo
Check out the product and get professional consultation with our network engineering consultant.

# Total Network Visibility
Monitor end-to-end network performance with high-frequency polling 
Request a Demo⟨29⟩ Discover our demo process 
![chart image⟨30⟩]
![dashboard⟨31⟩]
![10 years⟨32⟩]
## Minimize business downtime
Assure network performance and accelerate incident resolution
![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-logo-1.svg)
Capture every event with granular data
Use NetBeez for granular network performance metrics with one-second intervals, reducing troubleshooting time by up to 80%. Identify root causes quickly and keep users happy. 
![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-img-1-main.svg) ![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-img-1-1.svg) ![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-img-1-2.svg)
![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-logo-2.svg)
Locate, isolate, and address the root cause
Rather than experiencing the same problem over and over again, use NetBeez to accurately isolate the time and location of issues. Retain historical data to identify trends and perform root cause analysis on recurring issues. 
![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-img-2-main.webp) ![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-img-2-1.webp)
![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-logo-3.svg)
Detect problems before users do
Perform real-time, end-to-end network testing from the user perspective with continuous active monitoring. Detect service failures, network and application performance degradations quickly. 
![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-img-3-main.webp) ![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/themes/netbeez/assets/images/downtime-img-3-1.svg)
## Troubleshoot complex networks
See the issues from the end-user's perspective
NetBeez tech specs & features⟨33⟩
![decoration image⟨34⟩]
Multiple server deployment options
  * On-prem as a virtual appliance
  * On public clouds such as AWS, Azure, or Google
  * Hosted by NetBeez


![decoration image⟨35⟩]
Agents support extensive tests and measurements
  * Network latency, round-trip time, packet loss
  * VPN and SaaS monitoring
  * DNS tests and performance
  * Download and upload internet speed
  * VoIP performance with jitter and MOS


![decoration image⟨36⟩]
Flexible support & integration options
  * Plug-and-play hardware or software network agents
  * Lightweight clients for Windows and Mac OS endpoints
  * Monitor home and enterprise WiFi networks
  * Notifications via SMTP, SNMP, Syslog, and webhooks
  * Integrations with ServiceNow, Splunk, MS Teams, Slack, and more


## NetBeez is trusted all over the globe
80%
of our customers find us online
![decoration image⟨37⟩]
![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/twitter_thumb_201604_ccie_lifetime_emeritus_xlarge_600x600-1.png)
South Africa
The data from the NetBeez sensors shed light on metrics that we weren’t able to capture before with traditional network monitoring tools based on SNMP and NetFlow. Thanks to the active and end-to-end performance tests run by NetBeez, our support team can now save time and resources in addressing remote network performance issues. 
Dave Kruger
Technical Director at Myria Solutions, CCIE #25701 Emeritus
![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/05/Frame-93899-1.png)
USA
With NetBeez we gained the ability to determine the root cause and solve intermittent Wi-Fi problems in under an hour. Without NetBeez it would have taken a very long time to even discover the issue after receiving a student complaint. 
Christopher Pepper
Network Engineer at University of Rhodes Island
![](https://netbeez.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/sphere_1-1.png)
USA
Network performance monitoring vendor NetBeez has introduced a new Work-From-Home Agent that extends granular, real-time visibility into end-user experience in any home office, thus closing the visibility gap created by the surge in remote workers. 
Shamus McGillicuddy
VP of Research Network Infrastructure and Operations, EMA Research

generated_description:
**NetBeez: A Quick Overview**

NetBeez is a company focused on network monitoring from the end-user perspective. Founded in 2013 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W16, they're based in Pittsburgh, PA. With a small but capable team of 12 employees, they’ve carved out a niche in the tech industry, enabling IT teams to effectively troubleshoot communication and network performance issues, especially for remote users.

Their mission revolves around enhancing digital experience monitoring. Simply put, they provide tools that allow organizations to see their networks through the eyes of the user, addressing the shifting landscape of work—especially as remote work becomes the norm.

### What They Do

NetBeez specializes in a variety of monitoring solutions, including but not limited to:

- **Network Performance Monitoring**
- **Remote Worker Network Monitoring**
- **Wi-Fi Monitoring**
- **Hybrid-Cloud Network Monitoring**
- **Digital Experience Monitoring**
- **SaaS and Application Performance**

Their technology performs high-frequency polling to ensure that network issues can be detected and resolved rapidly, thereby minimizing downtime and ensuring consistent user satisfaction. The platform is designed to perform real-time testing and provide granular data to IT teams, helping them pinpoint and rectify issues autonomously.

### Why It Matters

In a landscape where organizations rely increasingly on remote services, having the ability to monitor network performance effectively is critical. NetBeez helps businesses enhance their operational efficiency by identifying network bottlenecks and performance degradations before users even notice them.

### Client Base and Industries Served

Their solutions cater to a range of industries including:

- Remote Contact Centers
- Technology
- Financial Services
- Telecommunications
- Healthcare
- Higher Education

These sectors require strong network reliability, and NetBeez allows them to maintain that even with the diverse challenges each industry faces.

### Get Involved

Want to delve deeper? You can visit their website [NetBeez.net](https://netbeez.net) to check out their offerings, request a demo, or learn more about how to enhance your network visibility.

In summary, NetBeez stands out by focusing on the user experience, making them a pivotal resource for companies trying to navigate the complexities of network performance in today's digital-driven world.
